meanings.definition: A set of four numbers that can be used to represent rotations and translations in three-dimensional space.
meanings.sent1: In mathematics, quaternions are used to describe rotations in 3D space.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used quaternions to calculate the movement of the object in space.
meanings.sent3: The quaternions danced around the origin, spinning in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of quaternions allowed her to navigate through the complex world of 3D graphics.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful blocks to explain quaternions to the students.

meanings.sent4: The quaternions of trees stood tall and proud in the forest.
